meanings.definition: To can't: to be unable to do something
meanings.sent1: I kant reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: She kant swim in deep water.
meanings.sent3: The cat kant open the door, so it meows for help.
meanings.sent4: His fear of heights kants him from climbing the ladder of success.
meanings.sent5: The broken elevator kants us from reaching the penthouse.

meanings.definition: Kant: a German philosopher known for his work in ethics and metaphysics
meanings.sent1: My friend is studying Kant in philosophy class.
meanings.sent2: Kant's ideas have influenced many thinkers.
meanings.sent3: Why did the student bring a Kant book to the beach? To have a sandy philosophy discussion!
meanings.sent4: In the world of philosophy, Kant is a towering figure.
meanings.sent5: The library shelves are filled with books about Kant's theories.
